LanguageData.PerodyneHigh.stages.0.label: 初始-隐藏
LanguageData.PerodyneHigh.stages.1.label: 舒爽
LanguageData.PerodyneHigh.stages.2.label: 胡思乱想
LanguageData.PerodyneHigh.stages.3.label: 麻痹
LanguageData.PerodyneHigh.stages.3.description: 一切都是那么有趣，但我很难察觉到。
LanguageData.PerodyneHigh.stages.4.label: 飘飘欲仙
LanguageData.PerodyneHigh.stages.4.description: 我觉得我在水底深处，在这里没有什么可以打扰我。
LanguageData.PerodyneHigh.stages.5.label: 疲惫不堪
LanguageData.PerodyneWithdrawal.stages.1.label: 佩诺蒂恩消退
LanguageData.PerodyneWithdrawal.stages.1.description: 我真怀念那飘飘欲仙的感觉。
